headline.main: HELEN HAYES HERE IN 'CANDLE IN WIND'; Will Star Tonight in Play by Maxwell Anderson at the Shubert Theatre

lead_paragraph: One of the season's auspicious events takes place tonight at the Shubert, where Helen Hayes will be seen in Maxwell Anderson's play, written in prose this time, and called "Candle in the Wind." Alfred Lunt directed the production. The joint sponsors -- the Theatre Guild and the Playwrights Company -- have been in no rush to unveil the offering here, preferring to keep it on the road for five weeks.
